articles.title: ADB touts microfinance role in building resilience vs climate change - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: MICROFINANCE institutions (MFIs) should be tapped in helping build resilience against climate change, especially for poorer and more vulnerable communities, according to the Asian Development Bank (ADB).

articles.title: More than 80 injured as Indian police clash with Adani port protesters - Reuters India
articles.description: More than 80 people were wounded in southern India as villagers halting the construction of a $900 million port clashed with police, the latest escalation of a months-old protest waged by a mostly Christian fishing community against Asia's richest man.
articles.content: KOCHI, India Nov 28 (Reuters) - More than 80 people were wounded in southern India as villagers halting the construction of a $900 million port clashed with police, the latest escalation of a months-… [+2673 chars]

articles.title: Rebecca Lim is married: The actress ties the knot in laid-back solemnisation and 600-guest wedding dinner - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Rebecca Lim, who married Matthew Webster on Sunday (Nov 27), was so chill that she even found herself short of outfits just two weeks before the big day.
articles.content: And then, when all the guests had gone home and the happy couple kicked their shoes off in their bridal suite with their close friends and family, the first thing I thought about was what we should h… [+694 chars]

articles.title: 'Not meant to be punitive': Amy Khor on rule requiring cabbies to search vehicles for lost items - AsiaOne

articles.description: The South Korean actress’ agency announced on Sunday (Nov 27) that she had welcomed a baby boy earlier that day.

articles.title: Does your child snore? It could be a sign of obstructive sleep apnoea – here's how to tell - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The snoring could be a sign of obstructive sleep apnoea, which may be the cause of behavioural problems such as ADHD in your child. Also, find out who sleeps longer and better: Asian or Caucasian children.
articles.content: As it turns out, there are also other factors that could predispose your child to snoring, according to a 2013 study on over 23,000 children from 14 countries in Asia Pacific, aged from birth to 36 m… [+1080 chars]
